Term.definition: a specified period of time [the policy ] 2

1.definition: a specified period of time [the policy ]

2.definition: the whole period for which an estate is grantedthe estate itself

3 a.definition: the period in which the powers of a court may be validly exercised

4.definition: a word, phrase, or provision of import esp. in determining the nature and scope of an agreement usually used in pl. [theof the contract]
